ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env mode

API_HASH.description: your API_HASH get it from telegram.org/api

URL.description: your URL, in the format https://<applname>.herokuapp.com/ with the trailing /

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: You can create a bot using @BotFather

AUTH_USERS.description: Space sperated IDs of users who are allowed to use the bot

TG_UPDATE_WORKERS_COUNT.description: Number of workers to use. `1` is the recommended amount see for yourself what works best!

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: This is required for the plugins involving the file system.

DELAY_BETWEEN_EDITS.description: delay between edits, should be an integer
